channel.title: Why wont my darkbow shoot! I did everything! (Devolution 7)
channel.description:
OMG This source is really starting to piss me off...
I added the dark bow everywhere!!!
I searched for 861 = Magic Short Bow
In:
Items.cfg WeaponHandler.cfg Client.java Item.java
Made it exactly for 15156
The bow just doesen't want to shoot!
My guy walks up to the npc and kills it, not shooting it...

item.title: Why wont my darkbow shoot! I did everything! (Devolution 7)

did you add the void that actually makes it shoot?

@_Rich wrote:

Lol, you’ve got to add it in constants.java, but you will probably have to delete bow making with bow strings, because then Dark bow will be fletchable, but it will work as a bow then.
